title: I have a problem with installing the game. Please HELP
body:
I was forced to delete my client and I recently found an urge to reinstall it, now I'm having issues.
> I am reinstalling it and everything works regularly until it starts "Applying Patches", it always stops at 87% and puts out a random ETA.
This is my 3rd or 4th time trying and I did everything that crossed my mind. I would really appreciate it if someone could help me out.
I need your support {{item:3107}} {{champion:111}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

Oh yeah, I'm running Mac OSX ElCapetan 64bit

replies.body:
At this point in the process, the patcher is trying to download updates but a weak connection might be causing a delay.  Unless you're getting any errors you should let the patcher do its thing.  Selecting to close out and restart it will force it to backtrack and scan all of your game files for corruption.  When finished, go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network strength.  Hopefully that helps!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
